reviews.title: Flameless candle
reviews.review_text: Good value for the price. Works well for my application. Neg is wax coated since I use it on my covered patio and live in a warm area the ambient temp usually makes the coating melt. Just put a saucer under it so you're not trying to clean melted wax off your patio tables.

reviews.title: Great buy and multifunctional
reviews.review_text: These battery operated lights were perfect for what I needed. Knowing small children may be at the dinner party, a battery operated candle provided another layer of safety. I placed the candles inside a glass lantern. Just the right ambience.

reviews.title: Nice glow
reviews.review_text: I like this candle very much. Nice soft glow. I got the ivory color. It comes on every night at the same time for 5 hours. The timer is very reliable. It has a little flicker. I use rechargeable batteries on my flameless candles otherwise you need to buy alot of batteries.

reviews.title: Great Candle that works perfectly all the time
reviews.review_text: This candle is very nice. The timer works great The white color is also nice, It requires 3aaa batteries and did go through them fast during the holidays. I had to change them 3 times but used them for long periods of time. I have Mainstays candles from previous yrs and always like them. All work great. always seem to need more so go right to Mainstays brand. Buy them if you like to use timer candles... Look great and work great...

reviews.title: Looks %26 feels real
reviews.review_text: This is a great item. It looks real as it is actually made out of wax. The greatest feature of all is the timer that is built in you flip the switch once and it stays on for six hours, then turns off and comes on at the same exact time the next day. If you choose, you can flip it off so it will stay off until you said it again.

reviews.title: I'm saving these for Halloween decor
reviews.review_text: I wanted three flameless candles to use in some hurricanes I have, and these seemed like they'd be a good fit. My issue is not with how they look when they're off (they look like regular pillar candles that have been slightly burned.) They do have a timer function, which is nice (though the programming of it is not really precise.) My biggest issue is that they glow a shade of orange I don't really care for. Orange is my least favorite color, so this is completely personal preference. I do think they will be cute in a little Halloween display though, so I will be saving them for that.

reviews.title: Damaged product!
reviews.review_text: Very disapponted with this order..The set of 2 flameless candles did not match!! Also one was damaged - dented badly- and I will NOT be able to use it. Nor can I return it. Better packing and delivery is very much needed!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these candles. I turned them both on the first night and set them on timer and the second night one of them never turned on. When I realized that I put in a new set of batteries for the third night and the next day, I realized that it wasn't going to turn on again, so the one candle used up two sets of batteries just in two overnights.

reviews.title: Bad candles
reviews.review_text: The candle looks great. When the candle worked, it was pretty. However, of the two candles I purchased, one stopped working after a month and it was barely used. The other one works but I have no need of it now that it's symmetrical twin no longer works.

reviews.title: Description of item is wrong
reviews.review_text: The online description of this candle as well as the label on the package is not accurate. The label shows the candle as 5.88 inches tall, which is true at the front of the candle, but the back of the candle is taller as it tapers up to 6.25 inches. That measurement is not shown anywhere on the label and that is important information if you have a particular size of candleholder.

reviews.title: Nice candle, terrible delivery
reviews.review_text: Product is fine - delivery when it's with Lasership/Ontrac or store delivery is always awful %26 anything fragile (such as this candle) arrives broken...always.

reviews.title: Short battery life
reviews.review_text: These are very bright which may be why batteries don't last long. They also aren't packaged very protective so they tend to be cracked or chipped. They do look realistic but after only a few weeks, I'm giving mine away!

reviews.title: Add Lovely Light to All of Your Rooms!
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure if I would like the "open" shape of the candles, but when they are on they are beautiful and you really see the faux candlelight. I have purchased additional candles in different sizes and love the way they add a lovely ambience to my home.

reviews.title: Happy with warm realistic candle glow
reviews.review_text: Love this Mainstays, unscented, flameless LED Candle 3 x 4" Ivory color candle! It has a nice realistic warm glow and the black wick helps it look more realistic too in my opinion! I bought it as a gift and one for myself along with a pack of batteries since it doesn't come with them. I am very happy and satisfied with this candle and would recommend it.

Candles worked great, no quality issues. And the wax is nice! However, returned because they just aren't close to realistic when illuminated. The light comes from the middle of the candle rather than the top, which actually has no light at all--it's dark at the top of the candle when illuminated. The light, at the center of the candle, is also very orange. It's not for me!

reviews.title: Shipping problem has been fixed. No broken candles
reviews.review_text: I love those candles, in the past the shipping was a huge problem. Most of the candles were thrown in a box and came broken. Today I got my order and the candles came in individual boxes and were all in good condition. I am very excited. I hope they start packaging the smaller candles the same way.

reviews.title: Wow what a hidden gem !
reviews.review_text: So…I originally purchased the small one for a small Lantern Well I went back and got the 5.88” high one for a candle ring I bought for my daughter! I could resist the price plus my little one is still light up brightly in its small Lantern. I can totally see Myself adding more to my collection too! I will not hesitate to tell anyone that these are soooooo good. Sooooo reasonable and brightly Lit! Thank you for offering something at a great price people can afford to buy!!im not going to Mention the high end ones I purchased that died In One week. The company name begins with an L and I was disappointed I spent the money for them! Then I'd be charged by the tv major shopping company to send them back! Never bought another flameless candle from them ever! I'll buy more of these gens!
They are a good size and the color of the candle makes a nice light. Got two and a tray to set on with some flowers. Mskes a nice arrangement.

reviews.title: NICE
reviews.review_text: It looks good in my display cabinet with no assembly. A little flicker and 5 hours of light is good for us.

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a battery operated candle to use in the classroom. This works perfectly for what I was needing.

reviews.title: The perfect candles!
reviews.review_text: These candles were just what I was looking for, without outrageous prices. I set the timers and forget it. The brightness is perfect, the flame flickers nicely, and these are perfect with candle rings around them.

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It fit perfectly in the holder. I don't have to worry about an actual flame. I also like that it can be put on timer.
It uses up the batteries in 8 days. For example, I have 2 no flame candles each with religious pictures. I can leave those on 24/7 and the batteries last 20 days.

reviews.title: Odorless!! 😊
reviews.review_text: Why didn't I do this a long time ago? LOL I love it in the metal cylinder vase I have with the 'tree of life' cut out design in it! I will buy more of these flameless candles. 🕯️🕯️🕯️

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: The candles do not work very well. One lights up the way it's supposed to, but the others are very dim. I put new batteries in each one. They were taller than a 3x3 candle also. Very disappointed and will be returning them.
The timer doesn't work correctly. Rather than 5 hours on %26 19 hours off, it's more like only 15 hours off, so it cycles every 20 hours instead of 24.

reviews.title: Batteries died in 2 candles within 2 weeks
reviews.review_text: These candles are a waste of money. They take 3 AAA batteries. Using the timer feature, both candles died within 2 weeks. That is crazy! A serious waste of money and the timer is useless unless you want to go through tons of batteries in a year

reviews.title: Avoid
reviews.review_text: Candles are attractive, but I need to put new batteries in them every 6-8 days. I have other battery operated candles and the batteries last at least 2-3 months. I have all my candles on timer. I am very, very disappointed, especially for $25.00

reviews.title: Flameless Candle
reviews.review_text: They have a five hour timer built in that I love. They use 3 AAA batteries and look and burn like a real candle. You can't beat the price either. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Not realistic
reviews.review_text: Candlewick is not believable. It needs to have something white over the black wick so it looks like it's burning. Will return one of them since it doesn't look real.

reviews.title: Great for lanterns
reviews.review_text: I needed a small candle for a lantern. I didn't really care about how "real" it looked. These are perfect for that. Bright enough and the price was right.
nice size color is warm am using them in my bedroom really nice at night can also be used outside when the weathers nice 5stars

reviews.title: Short battery life
reviews.review_text: Realistic looking but batteries don't last. Not my first battery operated candles and these have the shortest battery life I've seen.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Love the candle. Wish it would stay lit longer. I put it in a decoration on front porch for Autumn everything bought at Walmart of course. Flowers , gourds, lateen candle.

reviews.title: Timer setting
reviews.review_text: Perfect size, they have no scent. My favorite part I learned after getting them they have a timer switch. the candles will be lit for 5 hours, then shut off for 19, and come back on at the same time every day

reviews.title: PERFECT!
reviews.review_text: Not plastic but made from wax. It's an awesome candle for the price! The light is a warm and flickering, and it's the perfect size for the lantern I bought!

reviews.title: Timer function highly unreliable.
reviews.review_text: The timer on/off feature only works on one of the four I bought. They do work, but I can't use the timer. Lighting and design are fine, but the top part around the wick is rough and discolored.

reviews.title: very realistic looking
reviews.review_text: I bought three of these to put in three lanterns which I also got at Walmart love the lanterns love the candles! my only complaint would be the the batteries just don't last long enough so I'm going to have to switch to a more expensive battery that hopefully will last longer.

reviews.title: Ugly Redesign- Bring back the old candles!
reviews.review_text: These candles used to be good, but they were redesigned and now they're ugly! The old ones had a flat top with a light in the middle. Now they have a slanted top with a black toothpick that's supposed to look like a wick. The only problem I ever had with the old candles was that sometimes they would arrive broken when shipped, but that was because the person packaging the box didn't know how to wrap fragile items! They just threw the candles in a box with flat kraft paper. I wish they didn't change the look of the candle, because I don't like how these new ones look! I included pics of the new one vs. the old one.

reviews.title: Flameless Candle
reviews.review_text: I didn't receive it!!!!!!!!! Where is this ordered???????
Not sure going to work need to how how much light they can give Needed to know needed batteries
Just the right size of candle and I was needing a white color as well a timer.

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Best price for "wax" led candle with timer

reviews.title: Excellent Choice!!!
reviews.review_text: The candles work great, and turn on and off automaticly as set. They look great in my large porch lanterns. I would recommend this product as it is very nice, and priced very well too. It absolutely was delivered on time, and I could not have been happier.

reviews.title: quit working
reviews.review_text: after a few days of using it, it quit working, the flame became very dim. Changed batteries but still does not work. Liked that it had a timer

reviews.title: Almost like the real thing…
reviews.review_text: I liked everything about them EXCEPT they are “flameless.” I have a set in my “saved for later” items🙂
Not so much the product alone but the service to take care of my broken/damaged order was great. Orders and shipments are always so prompt.

reviews.title: One candle doesn't work at all, makes set useless
reviews.review_text: One candle doesn't work at all, leaving me with a useless set. They were purchased for a set of 3 candle bases that go together.
I use this light as a night light. So even if the power goes off I still have a night light. Batteries last a long time.
Haven't tried it yet but so far the quality seems fine. Durable and sturdy. I will submit further review after I have tried to use the product.

reviews.title: Nice and well crafted LED candles
reviews.review_text: Mainstays never fail in great pricing and quality. The candles are so nice and look awesome in the black candle holders on my mantle.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: I liked everything about it! Best thing ever you've been having a real candle. That's a Walmart review so they give me five dollars

reviews.title: Loooove these
reviews.review_text: I am in love with these! They look wonderful and give off such a warm light. You really can't beat these flameless candles for the price.

reviews.title: Good quality flame less candle
reviews.review_text: This candle is the perfect inexpensive good quality flame less candle, perfect size with perfect lighting.
Well the two I brought has a flickering to the light …when I turn them on not sure if that is how they supposed to be

reviews.title: Nice looking
reviews.review_text: Bought these to put in my sconces in my entry way mud room. They really put off a pretty glow and the price is great.
Will use if lose rlectricity but am leaving out as absolutely lovely. Only wish I had purchased AAA batteries as they took all I had.

reviews.title: Perfect Candle
reviews.review_text: I like that is flickers and is battery operated

reviews.title: Nah...
reviews.review_text: Not bright enough, doesn't look real and it has a yellow glow.
Candles are so nice the timer works well and for the money they are the Best Buy anywhere
Very realistic.Tiner wirked perfectly.Will recorder.

reviews.title: Frameless candle
reviews.review_text: Great decorative frameless candle with automatic timer turn on and off.

reviews.title: Just GREAT!
reviews.review_text: This was the 1st of these candles that I expect to buy!!!
It's nice to have in areas where I don't want things to catch on fire.
I love these I think they are great when the power go's out

reviews.title: Good candle for low light
reviews.review_text: It's a beautiful neat design. The LED flame is not bright but more of a soft glow.

reviews.title: Beautiful warm glow
reviews.review_text: I already have three more in my cart to purchase
I did not make in time to pick up one item. One of the 2 was not available

reviews.title: mainstay flameless candi
reviews.review_text: very nice candles. they're bright, and flicker nicely. I would buy again
Excellent and exactly what I needed. Great quality and price.

reviews.title: Overall satisfied. Would rebuy.
reviews.review_text: Liked this item, although I thought it was a real candle. Would get more if I could .

reviews.title: Nice LED pillar
reviews.review_text: Nice ivory LED pillar candle - perfect for cane hurricane just purchased.

reviews.title: LED Candle
reviews.review_text: Nice LED candle, good quality for the price.
The flameless candles were well priced and overall look realistic.
Love the function of switch on- off- timer. Do not like remote type. Realistic looking

reviews.title: Candle
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with candles! With these,I don't have to worry about a fire! Love the color!
Looks like a real candle. The flame flickers and the outside of it is made of wax. Well worth the money!

reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed...
reviews.review_text: I love that these candles look just like white pillar candles, but when you turn them on they have a goldish hue which was perfect for my daughter's party. The theme was white, black and gold! I actually gave them to family members that complimented the candles because I have the off-white at home. I only needed white for the party.

reviews.title: Best investment ever..
reviews.review_text: I bought these battery operated candles instead of real candles because i did not want any burn marks in my Hurricane Glass candle holders. They give off a warm glow and have a flame flicker effect. I have several sizes already displayed around my home and received lots of compliments on them .They are definitely a good investment.

reviews.title: Terrible Battery Life
reviews.review_text: I thought theae candles were a good price for the size, so I went "all in." Sadly, these candles only have a batrery life of 5-7 days. I've wasted a ton of $ and trips to many Walmart locations throughout the DMV to outfit my entire home with 1 candle per window, and I'll have to start grom scratch next holiday season to find better performing candles. In this case, you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Pretty, works well
reviews.review_text: I bought three for a Christmas centerpiece. I like them, they're nice for the price. But as someone else mentioned, even though the candle looks white, as soon as you turn it on-it's not. It's very warm toned, kind of yellow. Still pretty, but it's not the look I was going for.

reviews.title: battery candle
reviews.review_text: very natural look and feel of wax. not real bright, but gives out a large warm glow. perfect for a night light or to light areas during electrical outage. i bought several. they are attractive enuf to leave out when not in use also. arrived quickly, excellent condition, well packaged. i would buy again (and have) and recommend.

reviews.title: Eggs
reviews.review_text: Had ordered eggs on the grocery delivery. Everyone of them were broken. Took me four tries to get in touch with someone who claimed she was a grocery delivery manager. She said she would get someone to bring me another dozen and apologized. No one ever delivered my eggs nor called me. Poor management and too many kids goofing off and not working at this store. Hire people who actually have bills to pay and maybe they will do the work. Can't wait for Target to open.

reviews.title: A Nice Warm Glow
reviews.review_text: I finally got around to decorating my newly painted bedroom. When I was done all I needed was a couple of pillar candles. I debated on a regular candle or LED one. I decided on the LED candles because I didn't have to worry about what would happen if I fell asleep or was too sick to get up and put out a flame. I tried these a few days ago and I love them. They actually look like a burning candle and the light is so soft and warm. It does not come with a remote and it takes 3 AAA batteries.

These candles are awesome wih the amount of light they put out. My only issue is that the batteries last about a month and a half when using he timer. i should have known when i saw they took three triple A batteries. somive turned them off in some areas and will just use them as needed.

reviews.title: Looks great until you turn it on!
reviews.review_text: Most realistic when turned off. nice wax body, dramatic melted top and a great, realistic burnt wick. When turned on there is no "flame" at the wick, instead the entire wax body glows. A little disconcerting - not what you might expect of a "candle".

reviews.title: Very low quality
reviews.review_text: I purchased 9 of these. Two didn't work on arrival. Two more failed within 3 to 5 days. 3 more stopped working over a 2 week period. The timers don't work accurately either. I wasted a lot of batteries in these items, but when replacing they fail.

reviews.title: This candle looked lovely in theory
reviews.review_text: I bought this candle as a gift.It would have made a lovely gift with the other two I bought but Walmart shipped them to me in a box with no packing what's so ever.So the two candles kept hitting each other,thus they were destroyed.When i went to reorder they were out of stock.

reviews.title: Beautiful candle until you turn it on...
reviews.review_text: Pros: From the outside, this is a beautiful candle - looks like a real one, is made of wax, etc. Great quality for the price. Cons: the color of the light - it is ORANGE. Not "amber" - not a "natural candle glow" - we're talking pumpkin, Halloween orange. And because of this, what is a really beautiful, white candle when it's not turned on, all of a sudden looks really cheap and unnatural. So for this reason, I will be returning it. They just need to change the color of the bulb to a nice, warm white to make it realistic and a 5 star product, but as long as it has this horrific orange bulb in it, it's only getting 3 stars from me.

reviews.title: Elegant and functional
reviews.review_text: Nice color when lit and unlit, light is a warm yellow. Looks super classy, I love the fake wicks. The texture feels a bit waxy on the outside and adds to the realistic vibe. Timer setting works perfectly. I mixed with two other sizes and made a nice display.

reviews.title: Perfect Little Candles
reviews.review_text: First time experience with LED candles. I purchased these white pillar candles to go near my fireplace. Real candles kept melting from the fire. They are so pretty and I love the convenience. The timers really work!! The best part is you can use them again and again. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: just right
reviews.review_text: This was a perfectly adequate flameless candle for my need, and it was such a good price.

reviews.title: Wish took double a batteries otherwise love them
reviews.review_text: Thankyou for this lovely product

reviews.title: It looks like a candle but it is also a light.
reviews.review_text: A dinning room table design.

reviews.title: Great Glow 🕯️
reviews.review_text: I love this flameless candle. It turns on at 5:05 pm and stays on until 10:05 😇 I'm curious to see how long batteries last. I bought two. The glow is just right.

reviews.title: Halloween pumpkin
reviews.review_text: We bought this to put inside of a pumpkin for halloween and it worked out so great. It even went in and out like a real flame on a real candle super cute.

reviews.title: good price
reviews.review_text: I bout all sizes of ivory, and couple of white, they are heavy and nice, I was wishing for more 'fake flickering candle flame', but still very good, amber light.

reviews.title: Not sure what happened...
reviews.review_text: They stopped working after turning them on 3rd time... changed batteries and still nothing... maybe I got a bad batch... couldn't return them because return date passed...

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: I love the timer, the only dislike is they don't always work right with the timer on. But for the price they're great!! I have 4 of them and will probably buy more.

reviews.title: Can't take the heat
reviews.review_text: Bought to put inside our jack o lantern. We live by the coast in Texas - had it on the porch, out of the afternoon sunlight and it MELTED within two weeks. Only for indoors!

reviews.title: Nice but misshapen with cracks
reviews.review_text: These could have been really nice but they had cracks in them and they were misshapen. I'm assuming that they were left in a hot delivery truck or warehouse. I brought the package in the house within a few minutes of them being delivered.

reviews.title: used for window display
reviews.review_text: Bought these as an alternative to tge Holiday Time ones that were sold out. I displayed them in my front window at Christmas time. For what they were, they looked nice.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Great price and perfect little mood setting candle. The faux wick is a little weird because it's just there and a black color but can't really see it from far away.

reviews.title: Brightest flameless candles!
reviews.review_text: Recently purchased for lanterns and are very good. They have a bright light in entire candle versus some of the flameless candles that have light only at the top. Good value.

reviews.title: Looks nice and good price.
reviews.review_text: I picked this up at a store near me after it was cancelled on my order. It is exactly what I was looking for. It uses three triple A batteries and has two settings, standard and flicker.

reviews.title: Mainstay Flameless Candle
reviews.review_text: This is the best flameless candle I have ever bought. I love the size! I'm ordering more. I highly recommend this candle. The candles come in different sizes, too. This one is the largest.

reviews.title: Has a timer!
reviews.review_text: I love that this candle has a timer. So if you fall asleep with it on, it will go off at a designated time. I have some candles with a remote, but those do not turn off by themselves. This one is much better.

reviews.title: these are awesome with the timer!!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these they have timers on them which I love the most they come on at the same time every night they stay on for 4 to 6 hours and then go off and they are so beautiful and realistic in my candle holders and very affordable!!!

reviews.title: Perfect addition to our Christmas display
reviews.review_text: I ordered 3 to fit in black metal holders and they fit perfectly! The candle lights up well and they look amazing with our artificial poinsettias in our church. Seriously thinking about getting some for my house

reviews.title: Read before Buying.
reviews.review_text: The candle looks good when it's off, that's about it. I honestly thought it was going to flicker like a real candle, but the way it flickers, I thought it was broken. I even returned it the first time thinking it was broken. Just going to keep it at this point and look elsewhere for a more realistic LED flicker flame.

reviews.title: Great candle...except for the fake flicker
reviews.review_text: First off the price is great for this product. It looks realistic with a nice warm color. It puts off a decent amount of light for ambiance in a dark room. Not as effective in a room already lit. Has a wax exterior so the texture and feel of it feels real. The shape and the wick look great. And it has an on/off/5 hour timer switch! The problem comes when you turn it on. The candle effect is an unrealistic mechanical flicker, like it's short circuiting on and off. And the entire candle glows from top to bottom evenly. No candle does that. They should have invested in an LED light that slowly fades on and off for the glow. Not the hard abruptly flicker. So it does the job...but could be a lot better.

reviews.title: works great looks great
reviews.review_text: This doesn't give off too much light but creates the perfect ambiance lighting on the balcony and it was a very good price. Super fast shipping to.

reviews.title: questionable purchase
reviews.review_text: seems to have a short, not connecting well with the batteries...banged on it etc finally turned on..question is for how long!
Nice economical way to add soft lighting anywhere without the concern of glass breaking or the need for matches.
My order has always been correct. The ladies and gentlemen that bring the order to the car are very courteous.

reviews.title: good
reviews.review_text: I was looking for more white light, but they work fine and I like the size and shape. one was dinged, but not broken.

reviews.title: Love this candle
reviews.review_text: Love this candle. Has a timer so it turned off and on without any thought from me. I have other sizes as well. Great for seasonal decorating.

reviews.title: Perfect for use in sconces
reviews.review_text: Perfect for use in my sconces. I also have 3 that I previously purchased on a wide based candelabra,

reviews.title: Loved them
reviews.review_text: Have bought them three times . Love that they are already on when I get home in evening thanks to the timer feature.

reviews.title: Really nice LED candle.
reviews.review_text: This is a super great LED candle.It isnt too bright,and gives off the perfect ambiance when I am watching movies in my room. I plan on buying more.

reviews.title: Very disappointing.
reviews.review_text: The candle is white but when it's turned on the entire candle glows orange. I don't need an orange candle.
My order was 2 days late. I ordered 4 candles. 1 was broken. Terrible service. This was my 1st and last time using Walmart. Com

reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
reviews.review_text: Good general size for my candle holders. The timer feature works very well! Nice, warm, golden glow.

I love these little candles. I use rechargeable AAAâs rather than alkaline batteries to save money and be earth friendly. I set the timer so that when I get home from work so my house isnât so dark.
They don't come with batteries and it's shows it did come when I went home to light them up and decor them I was totally shocked that they don't have batteries and they need 3 batteries !!!
You carry Martha Steward, they are perfect, exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE CAMPING LITE
reviews.review_text: Great little camping lite. just enough lite to get around for the Grand kids
nice glow fo the price--not real candlelight but safe and pretty.

reviews.title: very real looking
reviews.review_text: Only wish it came with remote.Otherwise it is a very nice candle.

reviews.title: You're very cute and what I needed
reviews.review_text: Perfect little fake flickering candle

reviews.title: Great candles
reviews.review_text: These candles are attractive and work as well as much high-priced ones.
They are beautiful. Best price around. Thanks walmart.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: These are awesome! I love the 5 hour auto shutoff that it has, along with the continuous setting.

reviews.title: none
reviews.review_text: i was not aware it was battery operated but i got the batteries and it's fine now

reviews.title: really pretty
reviews.review_text: they are as good as if not better than the pricer macy's candles
When you order 4 items you don't expect 25% to be broken.

reviews.title: Very Pleased
reviews.review_text: Just what I was looking for to put in a Memorial Candel.

reviews.title: Very Pleased
reviews.review_text: Just what I was looking for to put in a flower wreath.
Returning unopened because we only received one of three ordered

reviews.title: Doesn't work
reviews.review_text: Doesn't work, now I have to drive back, wait on line etc.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: These are awesome. I use them outside to light up our deck.

reviews.title: Great LED Candle

reviews.review_text: soothing ambiance. Has timer ability. Using it in a hanging macrame hanger.

reviews.review_text: Love that the whole candle lights up, it's more impactful. Can't beat the price!

Very very happy with candle. Looks wonderful, works well.

These candles are awesome and the low price for them is unbelievable!

reviews.title: Great LED candle!
reviews.review_text: It doesnt look totally fake at all, and adds a nice, safe glow on its own or in a holder.

reviews.title: Looks real!
reviews.review_text: It has a timer which is the only candle to have.

reviews.title: Fantastic candles
reviews.review_text: Great, safe candles. Long battery life.
Its not ivory - its yellow. Wish I had seen it, I would have bought white. But still a good price.

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: Love them they look so real, I love that they have a timer also..

reviews.title: Simulates Real Candle
reviews.review_text: I like the subtle flicker that simulates a real candle.
it's perfect as an electric candle but has the wax feeling like a real candle and lights perfectly
needed for light during hurricane Milton . light was not bright enough. Really did not suite my need. They are better for a different purpose.
These lifelike lighted candles are beautiful. I only wish that the wick had a micro led light . They're very attractive.
I like everything about these candles! They're a great candle for evening, romantic Setting if you wish.
very nice, also has 2 settings, one on and one timed. batteries seem to last a long time.
Pretty off white color. Not the yellow color I usually see.

reviews.title: Invest in a better brand, these are junk.
reviews.review_text: Bought 2 of these and neither one will work. If you shake either one you'll get a flicker of light, but something isn't getting good contact on either candle. Got these through grocery pickup. One was cracked in multiple places and chunks fell out on opening. Walmart refunded both, so I'm not out any money.

reviews.title: Perfect ambience!
reviews.review_text: Perfect alternative to real candles. Much more cost efficient; less pollution and waste. No “candle wax” in the air to breathe. Fools even the observer eye! Only thing you give up is aroma that real candles emit. However, during this season, home is always filled with wonderful, warm cookie and treat aroma.

reviews.title: How to have a candle without a real candle.
reviews.review_text: I love the very slight flicker to this candle and the feature of an on/off button or an on for five hours with auto shut. I place this candle into a holder that allows a golden glow through the glass. It was just what I was looking for in order to avoid an actual flamed candle.

Needed some candles for my bedroom as room decor and these fit perfect with the aesthetic. However the light in the candles went out completely on the 3 separate candles within 2 weeks. I only had them on for maybe a total of 20 hours maximum. They have really great potential but a waste of money in my opinion if they only last a short time

reviews.title: Very realistic, great price.
reviews.review_text: Needed an inexpensive candle to add to a candle globe for a door prize. Perfect.

reviews.title: Highly recommend!
reviews.review_text: Great for those who are sensitive to scents but can still enjoy the ambience of these candles! 🕯️

reviews.title: Beware. Damaged (twice)
reviews.review_text: I ordered 8 candles for a craft for my daughters birthday. I received 6 out of 8 candles and they were all damaged when they arrived. Walmart did replace them but the new 8 are also damaged. Not worth the money or frustration at all.

reviews.title: Not Bright
reviews.review_text: This candle came with a button to show how bright the candle is. Then when u get it home and put batteries in it, the candle is very dim. Very misleading.
Be prepared to stock up on batteries bc these candles are battery eaters. I have other flameless candles with timers and haven't replaced batteries in over a year.

reviews.title: Blameless candle
reviews.review_text: I needed a blameless candle for a lateen on the patio. This candle is perfect. Looks and feels like the real thing. Just the right size. I also like the way the whole candle seems to light up.
Wrong price on shelf, was not the price I thought it was. Happens all the time in this store, deceiving and not really Fair.

reviews.title: Bad candle!
reviews.review_text: Four out of four of these candles stoped working a few months after purchase. Good thing Walmart has a good return policy.

reviews.title: Great fake candle
reviews.review_text: This acts just like a real candle in my candle vase, and i love the timer, turns on %26 off same time every night. I love it!

reviews.title: Great realistic candle
reviews.review_text: The flame is realistic and the item feels like an actual candle. The timer function wonderful! I don't have to worry about turning it on or off.
You used to have the ones with just the bulb that lights up. I don't like these where the whole candle lights up and no bulb
Bought 2 packs of 3 candles. In one pack 2 of the 3 came broken. Other pack was fine.

they use up batteries way to fast and also quit working too
